author: Vanmala Subramaniam
title: Amid COVID-19, companies struggle to balance operations with increasingly fearful workers
description: Even though governments are telling Canadians to hunker down and stay home, some employers are urging workers to work even harder
content:
Richard thoroughly wiped down his lift truck early last week at the start of his usual morning shift at Matrix Logistics Services Ltd., a precaution in the corornavirus age that he said was criticized as time-wasting by his direct supervisor.
“Everything run… [+7387 chars]
